node.excerpt:
PaperFaces portrait of @jinthagerman. Landscapes are more forgiving, I think that’s why I spend time drawing them over facial features.

And just so it’s recorded, this is the illustration I was working on when my Pogo Connect Smart Pen died. Was trying to paint a large continuos tone to define the mountains and instead was left with choppy marks. Examined the Pogo’s tip and noticed a metal contact that…
